about_the_game:
Play as a robot with time-manipulating abilities. Travel to places you’ve never been by independently shifting back in time along the X and Y axes. But beware of pockets of corrupted space-time, and remember, tracking your positions through time consumes significant memory—without it, you won’t be able to function.

Manipulate Space Time

Navigate puzzles keeping track of where you have been to reach places you could not reach before!

Beware of Corrupted Space Time

The straightest path is not always possible.

Limited Memory Capacity

Keep track of your memory available or you will over heat.

Level Editor

Make levels to share your creativity with others so we can all enjoy more puzzles together!

Play as a robot with time-manipulating abilities. Travel to places you’ve never been by independently shifting back in time along the X and Y axes. But beware of pockets of corrupted space-time, and remember, tracking your positions through time consumes significant memory—without it, you won’t be able to function.

Manipulate Space Time

Navigate puzzles keeping track of where you have been to reach places you could not reach before!

Beware of Corrupted Space Time

name: A Space Between Time Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as a robot with time-manipulating abilities. You can go to places you've never been before by going back in time in the X and Y axes independently. Just beware pockets of time corruption, and tracking your positions in time consumes a lot of memory. At max capacity, you can no longer function.
